text: vahee raat ko (badha ke) din mein daakhil karata hai (to raat badh jaatee hai) aur vahee din ko (badha ke) raat mein daakhil karata hai (to din badh jaata hai aur) usee ne sooraj aur chaand ko apana muteei bana rakha hai ki har ek apane (apane) muayyan (tay) vakt par chala karata hai vahee khuda tumhaara paravaradigaar hai usee kee salatanat hai aur use chhodakar jin maaboodon ko tum pukaarate ho vah chhuvaaron kee guthalee kee jhillee ke baraabar bhee to ikhateyaar nahin rakhate
